page.title: 02Fairy Farm - The People
page.content: There are 6 people who live in the house, it was biult in 1853. There was an older house built on the site but it was burnt down. The family consists of the farmer, his wife and 4 children. They have got some pets, 2 dogs and 1 cat. They have rabbits but not as pets, they are for food. The children go to Hedingham School for their secondary education. When the people were asked if they chose the name they said "No." Then they said that they didn't like the name. They said that they would like to change the name of the farm to "Brick House Farm."
